name: In Another Castle (Sir_Blooper)
description:
In Another Castle

In this game, the story centers around a kidnapped princess waiting in a castle for someone (who sends you letters of their progress) to come rescue her. As the player, you have the ability to talk to the castle inhabitant, a guard tasked to keep you from escaping who has mixed feelings concerning his job description, read personal diary entries in addition to letters from the hero, and progress through the story by waiting on your bed before moving from castle to castle.
